lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think "Kiva" is a great concept and though I am not particularly well off I know there are people in this world who are in greater need than myself. And I believe helping others if we can is what its all about!!
lender.occupational_info: I don't work at the moment as I'm still recovering from a nasty motorcycle accident.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Al Bar
lender.loan_because: "It never hurts to help." --Eek the Cat
lender.occupational_info: Miscreant with technical know-how.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: people need it.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.occupational_info: I work with the librarians at a university library, and I hope to become a librarian myself!

lender.name: Jai
lender.loan_because: I am an internationalist who is lucky enough to be born in a first world country.
lender.occupational_info: I help manufacturing workers work together to secure better lives for their families.

lender.name: noah
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur, marketing consultant, and social media strategist with a passion for inspiring others to follow their own dreams. Over the past five years, Noah has worked with over 500 aspiring Internet Marketers in dozens of industries, many of whom have gone on to operate incredibly successful online ventures. Noah has also worked with people starting their very first business, with large organizations that have been around for decades, and just about everybody else in between.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and Kiva makes it so easy, and because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and inspire people to be better and do better in all areas of life.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Shorterm has 37 years experience comprising every aspect of placing highly skilled, technical and professional specialists within Engineering, Construction, Rail and Commercial & Industrial Service industries. rn
lender.occupational_info: Shorterm has 37 years experience comprising every aspect of placing highly skilled, technical and professional specialists within Engineering, Construction, Rail and Commercial & Industrial Service industries. rn

lender.name: Maritza
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I create art that is inspired by histories, memories, and events that in a way or another affect my life and that of people around the world.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office environment for a Class I railroad.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others, and simultaneously, make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am an Academic Advisor empowering students to enhance their skills to establish careers that will build better citizens for our society.

lender.name: kim
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping this way will increase empowerment.

lender.name: Gale
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Loans to complete my university course, In order to prove my personal value, I have to finish my studies.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Its the least anyone who's privileged and fortunate enough to have a healthy body and living a decent life on earth to help others who need it, this is my way of contributing!
lender.occupational_info: in the financial sector, where every day is a different challenge

lender.name: Kevan
lender.loan_because: A kind heart can help make the world a better place to exist in.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a powerful force for improving the lives of people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: Travel photography and portrait photography.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Unlike donations, lending empowers and targets self sustainability. Most important of all, it shows respect to the ability of people to be creative, to work and to manage their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I create projects that target making the world a better place.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to own my own business someday and like to support those who have the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Ulrich
lender.loan_because: During a trip in Cambodia I saw the poverty around Ankor Wat; at the same time those two girls presented me with a lotus blossom. I saw their true joy when I gave them some money. I realized later that I can help, even if it is only one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I used to look at rocks and wanted to find metal ore and oil.

lender.name: Miss K
lender.loan_because: I wish to help women from different parts of the world start their own businesses

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: I can. You can too.
lender.occupational_info: I shoulder the unpleasant things my client's talk about and worry about around their kitchen table at night. I worry about their issues, too. I also use my skills to make their lives and situations better for them. I practice mainly family law and criminal defense law.

lender.name: bud
lender.loan_because: I have many friends in the Colon and La Miskito areas of Honduras that are hard working and industrious, but lack the venture capitol to get started. I thought if I got started helping others in Honduras I could learn a bit more about micro finance and possibly help those I know.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sheet metal worker. We design, fabricate and install air conditioning systems in commercial buildings. We also do architectural metal work such as roofs and siding. In my spare time i also guide medical teams into the La Miskito area of Honduras to provide health services to the indigenous population that reside there. Visit our website at www.projectchimes.org

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Director of a Child Abuse Prevention Agency serving kids and families

lender.name: Niels
lender.loan_because: I crossed many countries on my bicycle and know what a big difference a small loan can make. Also, people along the road have been so great to me, this is my way of doing something back.
lender.occupational_info: A few years ago I set up www.greenseat.com where people can calculate and offset carbon emissions of their flight. Currently, I am working on a renewable energy cooperation: www.ener.coop

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can, really. Why not give money when you're able?
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student at Fordham University right now. It's my Freshman year right now, and I'm not sure what I want to major in.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: Even though I'm a single parent, I live in a place that allows me to earn enough to keep a roof over my head, food on the table, and live a healthy, happy life. I can only hope the little I can give will help someone else create and/or sustain a healthy, happy life as well!
lender.occupational_info:
I love showing off my Canadian pride and the mountains & ocean of the Pacific Northwest. We have the best 'backyard' to play in, especially on two wheels!
Waterfitness is also a huge passion, and it's wonderful to see my participants progress to meet and increase their goals through the huge and wide array of benefits in aquatics.
People in the world have all sorts of opinions, so in sharing those voices we can understand better the diversity in the world and - hopefully - better adapt and cooperate with each other :)

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: ...the impact of my small donation has the power to be life changing
lender.occupational_info: I help people find work that brings meaning and value to their lives.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I see the opportunity to assist hard-working people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying ethics and education in a Canadian university.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Helps get folks that first rung of the ladder, leaves autonomy for them to climb it, and starts to balance "wealth" into more hands.

lender.name: L. A. Carter
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed these past two years and I'm showing my appreciation by paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to learn more about the craft of telling stories and to get better as a writer.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: it's something I can do to help.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all you need is a little puch to get started.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mikkel Elsborg
lender.loan_because: I want to give back, and share my success with others...
lender.occupational_info: I work with vessels in a world wide market and want to share my good luck, and give others who would not have the possibility if it was not for kiva.org

lender.name: Sonja & Michael
lender.loan_because: We want to be involved with something so positive and life changing for people that are trying to simply better their lives.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are a powerful way to support people who are trying to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I help people find jobs after they finish vocational training programs at Emily Griffith Opportunity School in Denver, Colorado.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunities I was lucky enough to have

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have way more than I need.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: To allow for greater equity around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a crisis counsellor and consider it a privilege to work with people who are going through particularly tough times in their lives.

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and privledged to be part of this wonderful service which brings opportunities and to support to so many people.

lender.name: kerrie
lender.loan_because: IT MAKES SUCH A DIFFERENCE AND FOR SUCH A LITTLE IT GIVES GREAT INDEPENDANCE TO THESE PEOPLE
lender.occupational_info: I WORK AS A BANK TELLER LOOKING AFTER PEOPLES FINANCIAL NEEDS AND THIER MONEY

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I have witnessed the wrecks of Haitian boats and hope that through KIVA, I can stop one person from making that trip.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved with Community Economic Development, social enterprises, Social Finance, responsible & impact investing

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: for the longest time helping people attain resources to sustain themselves & their families has been written on my heart. It's what sets me on fire and ultimately what I want to pursue. I so admire & appreciate the way Kiva connects people & I hope to some day affect change in this same way.

lender.name: Sarah Prout
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are amazing, creative and vibrant people that deserve support to make their dreams a reality no matter what their background.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and entrepreneur that works with creative kindred spirits from across the globe.

lender.name: Steve Lundeen
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much that it is within my power to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Pharmacist at community clinic

lender.name: Jani
lender.loan_because: I like supporting people who are willing to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: Computer software development (internet)

lender.name: Thies
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to do something good! I really admire some of the entrepreneurs on Kiva who are working hard to build their businesses in challenging conditions. It makes me happy to think that my loans can help them.
lender.occupational_info: I film and edit videos for journalistic and commercial purposes.

lender.name: Millionairess Invest.
lender.loan_because: We are a women's investment club, committed to improving our own and other women's financial health.

lender.name: Sara
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a special education teacher.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: I manage data for a wind power company.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I can. With Kiva my money isn't vanishing into some anonymous church or organisation. I can see what's happening.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure no one gets hurt digging big holes.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: I've had a lot of opportunities in life, and other people should also have the opportunity to be healthy and independent.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students learn research skills.

lender.name: Deb & Norm
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to share with less fortunate hard-working friends around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Program Director & Banker

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can afford to...

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference for people that are trying to help themselves. It's a perfect example of "small is beautiful" Everyone can make a difference when we approach life on a small scale, one-to-one basis. And having a global reach is a plus.
lender.occupational_info: Land planning and site design for any kind of land development, including layout of functional elements (buildings, vehicular and pedestrian circulation and other special elements like gathering areas). Designing man-made elements to fit onto the land and creating new places for people to live, work and play.

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: I have just found out about this program and think it is a fantastic way to make a difference to other people's lifes. Additionally, I have been looking for a way to honour my daughters memory and I think this is a fitting way in which her short life leaves a lasting mark on the world.

lender.name: Jochen
lender.loan_because: It helps

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: "ya gotta have money, to make money"!
lender.occupational_info: a cog in a big machine

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It is a human right to have the opportunity to fullfill our dreams and when we work together it makes that possible...
lender.occupational_info: I work as an artist and it is my dream to contribute through my art a vision for a more peaceful and loving humanity.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I think its important to help those who want to help themselves. Sharing the experience is rewarding and is important in a world when so many people have become so self centred.
lender.occupational_info: I have 2 children and help my husband run our family owned construction company. We started with nothing and have built it up so we can employ a team of local people in our local community. We think it helps build strong families and strong communities.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I was given a loan to get started. I lived in Africa as a young girl and love the idea of being of help to someone there, the way africa filled me with good memories of kind people.
lender.occupational_info: I grow herbs and bag them in a machine and then put them in a colourful box (in french and english) and then sell them to health stores.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people help themselves. It's very inspiring to see people all over the world helping people all over the world!
lender.occupational_info: My organization helps people become homeowners who could not normally afford it. Habitat for Humanity builds houses for low income families and sells the houses to the families at a low cost with no interest. Families work on the houses 300 hours.

lender.name: Karoline
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help researchers do the admistrative work in getting funding for their projects. I do the government paperwork in order to apply for the grants. After the grants are obtained, I manage the finances for the grants

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I can turn on a tap and get clean water, I have access to healthcare, food, and a safe place to sleep. I can afford to travel to places where this isn't always possible. I want to make a difference - not just take a photo.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: With such small amounts people can do so much, I've been helped now I can do a bit in return

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic idea to help people to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I create print based design work that includes logos, stationery, brochures, posters, flyers, packaging and advertising

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university professor in a business school.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: it is such a great way to give a hand up to people, and it is ongoing. By repaying the loans, they are also helping to give others a hand up when the money is re-loaned. It is people helping people at the grass roots.
lender.occupational_info: I was asked to make a knitted nativity scene for someone, who insisted on paying me for it. I added some of my own money, and was able to make 4 loans initially. I mean to make more loans as I am able.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: i would to like to add my capital to my small store in our place.
lender.occupational_info: i am helping our parish through Parish Social Action Livelihood to support our group of men and women for thier livelihood activities

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I would want to not be afraid to ask for help if I needed it. I need to be a part of a world that helps one another to believe this.
lender.occupational_info: I help the business (sales, quality control) talk to Information Technology (Tech, IT). I solve business efficiency problems.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by business people of all kinds, and I believe it will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: When a company needs a new executive, they ask me and my firm to find the right person.

lender.name: Jessika
lender.loan_because: I would not be where I am if it were not for the faith that others have had in me.

lender.name: jeeni
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: love makes the world go round!

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: I am always worried about I never have any money. But, when I look at how unfortunate so many people are in the world, I realize how rich I am.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: we should all help each other. Everyone deserves the right to work for themselves and start their own business to earn the income they deserve so they can support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business designing websites and brochures for other businesses. I have a passion for travel, new adventures and meeting new people.

lender.name: Les & Kaye
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a contribution to the life of others.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students how to do dentistry for children and adolescents.

lender.name: Steven Harriman
lender.loan_because: people have helped me along my way so I should give back

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I happened to be born into a "have" part of the world. To whom much is given, much is required.
lender.occupational_info: As an actor I help tell a person's story. As an early childhood educator, I help ensure that children are developing well physically, mentally, verbally, socially, and emotionally. I help them get a great start in life so they can be active members of society making positive contributions in the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I help university teachers to use technology (computers, web sites, video cameras, audio recorders) so that they can better teach their students.

lender.name: tamara
lender.loan_because: I respect and admire people,especially women, who work hard to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed writer and live event producer.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a long term difference in their lives and communities!
lender.occupational_info: I study literature and teach written composition to college students.

lender.name: The Louie Family
lender.loan_because: everyone should be given a chance!
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days looking after my 2 beautiful children- Jaia who is 3yrs, and Anais who is 2 years. My husband works in the construction of houses.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I believe a hand up is worth more than a hand out, and everyone deserves a chance. Together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work, but I have held many jobs in the past to make ends meet.

lender.name: Imran
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people with the love for their family, responsibility and motivation to help themselves!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization the promotes and supports the arts.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a little boost!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Jesus said to give to those who need to borrow.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person.
lender.occupational_info: I create media and art using technology, as well as traditional methods such as painting and drawing. I am also a photographer and film maker. One of my great passions include travel and documenting nature and culture.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: it's my birffffday.
lender.occupational_info: At work I facilitate the use of tools that help people share their opinions and ideas, for an organization that has the means to broadcast said ideas.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: I believe those who are fortunate enough to have had work and health should help those who face hardship.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive contribution to change lives and end poverty.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I like to help the disadvantaged to achieve and gain self worth.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand now and then.
lender.occupational_info: Attorney for a media/ technology company

lender.name: Christian Biggins
lender.loan_because: The members of developed countries have a moral obligation to help those who were not born into such luck.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites and web applications

lender.name: Noree
lender.loan_because: It's the most direct way I can help poor people at this stage of my life. I would love to do missions work after I get out of school, but for now this is awesome!

lender.name: McKenzie
lender.loan_because: I think this is one way to change the world DIRECTLY, Making a real difference in someone's life. Its much more effective than donating to one of the many organizations that takes 80% off the top and barely get anything to the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architecture student, studying to build sustainable, affordable buildings.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupation: Mom of one son and one daughter
lender.loan_because: Working together we can create opportunity and miracles
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist, volunteer, mother, daughter and wife

lender.name: fred
lender.loan_because: I believe in the people I loan to. I trust them to put this money to good use. Much better than anything banks can offer. Or than what I would do with it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm one of the people who make computers useful. I'm also one of the guys responsible when they're just frustrating, but we're working on it...

lender.name: Wheel Loaders, Mobile
lender.occupation: Big Machinery, world wide equipment dealer supply.
lender.loan_because: Big Rental, a division of Big Machinery provides heavy construction & transport equipment like graders, dozers, trucks & trailers in caterpillar, hitachi, komatsu, volvoand mercedes-benz brands.
lender.occupational_info:
For more than 20 years, BIG Machinery has been building the worlds leading distributor and supplier of heavy construction and mining equipment.
BIG Machinery stock of heavy equipment, consisting of more than 150 new and used machines. We have the largest fleet in Europe, and consequently, we can deliver the equipment you want at very short notice.
We supply equipment for very varied applications, from mining, construction and road construction to screening and crushing directly from stock: Articulated trucks, rigid frame trucks, back hoes, dozers, excavators, wheel loaders, mobile excavators, graders, generator sets, telehandlers, trailers, trucks, mixertrucks, concrete pumptrucks, asphalt plants and concrete plants.
BIG Machinery delivers heavy equipment of all leading brands as: Caterpillar, Mercedes-Benz, Volvo, Komatsu, Scania and Hitachi.
We are a global company, with locations on almost every continent of the world to serve and support you, and respond quickly to needs.
BIG Machinery B.V. Schiemerik 1 5334 NL Velddriel The Netherlands

lender.name: Jesse & Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone grow as a person & for them to be able tomake a better life for them & their family
lender.occupational_info: I help leaders prevent people getting hurt at work

lender.name: Stephen Baines
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to make a difference and develop themselves and do the very best they can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people across Europe, the Middle East and Africa to make safer, secure and more energy efficient buildings.

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I can't offer much, but what I give I give freely and happily.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Hospital lab in the mornings helping in skin cancer surgeries. And in the afternoon and evenings I go attend school to one day be a doctor.

lender.name: Jo & Paul
lender.loan_because: we think it is a great idea to be able to help other people & their families achieve their dreams

lender.name: Emilio
lender.loan_because: it is everyone's first responsibility to look after himself. But when this is not enough, society has to help. I feel priviledged by life and want to share - if it the project is concrete and where it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help business executives to deliver complex and difficult messages in the form of presentations or speeches to coworkers, shareholders, clients, the public ...

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because:
I have received so much kindness, inspiration and generosity from remote and struggling communities.
This is one small way in which I can give back to all those people; to those who have made my life that much richer.
This is to say 'Thank you' for opening your doors and hearts to a stranger.
Money cannot buy equity, or freedom... but if a loan can empower someone to lift themselves up, and boosts their confidence in not only themselves but also humanity, then that $25 is instantly worth so much more.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I like to see the success stories.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse educator. I co-ordinate clinical education and recruit and support newly qualified nurses.

lender.name: Andrew B
lender.loan_because: It is important to assist people, by providing them financial assistance which they otherwise wouldn't have without micro-credit.
lender.occupational_info: I work repairing (and sometimes making) industrial machinery. I would love to be able to share some of my skills with the entrepreneurs on kiva, but unfortunately I don't know how.

lender.name: AnneMarie
lender.loan_because: Because it's nice to be able to help someone make a difference in their life and sometimes lives of others

lender.name: simon
lender.loan_because: Give a someone a fish & they will eat for a day (charity), provide them with a micro loan & they can buy a boat, hire others, pay taxes, educate their children and feed not just their own family but provide a means to help the whole village.
lender.occupational_info: Innovation in banking, driving change, Thinking outside the box.

lender.name: Alison
lender.occupation: Mother, Founder of Giving One Percent
lender.loan_because: It's easy, it's interesting, it's effective and it improves lives, including mine.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my family and I run a startup not-for-profit called Giving One Percent, a website that supports a culture of giving by Australians to the world's poor, with lots of tools to help plan and maintain your giving.

lender.name: Goodwill Bank
lender.loan_because: All people are deserving of the opportunity to be all they can be in their life. It is our privilege to help - live your dream :-)

lender.name: Tarik
lender.loan_because: my parents grew up in a developing country but then travelled to Australia. This supported a better life for them and their kids. Its time to give back.

lender.name: Chapman Family
lender.loan_because: Seems its an immediate and direct way of helping people help themselves. By doing it this way, the pitfalls of government subsidies and administrations are avoided. It also means that instead of the stigma of accepting charity (which does not teach folks to help themselves), folks can keep their pride by borrowing what they need and use it to help themselves, thus breaking the poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I use chemistry, physics and engineering to help make steel products more environmentally friendly

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is a worthy cause.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Hectic

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Because I can
lender.occupational_info: I make websites

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: The clich most people just want a hand up - not a hand out - never rang truer than in Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Small business owner.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: of empathy.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Onesimo Kolln
lender.loan_because: I believe in other people dreams or projects. It is worth to invest to someone who is fighting to overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a warehouse operative semi-skild and I starting to develop a work as a bookshop seller out of my normal shift hours. To sustain my family, (I have wife and two boys)
Onesimo Kolln

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful way of making a real difference to our brothers and sisters around the world. Living in a country like Australia I have had opportunities all my life that some others had not, and through no fault of their own. If I can help others in some small way to achieve their potential in life & in turn help their communities to thrive for the sake of a few dollars...then count me in.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed in a technical role for a National Commercial Television Network (Network Ten - Channel Ten) here in Melbourne, Australia

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I think we can all do something to help others, no matter how small. I want to be part of something that makes the world a better place for all of us.

lender.name: Meera & Frode
lender.loan_because: we want to help.

lender.name: Luke and Tamara
lender.occupational_info: I look for work, are you hiring?

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: I have a problem giving material gifts and have found that donating is a happy medium.
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a grocery store. I oversee 85 people in their daily jobs and ensure that everyone has what they need for success

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I know it is the right way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Producting bread and pastries.

lender.name: The Clippingers
lender.loan_because: this is a great way for your donations to be used time and again to help multiple people.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I'm in the fortunate enough position to be able to, and that makes it a no-brainer.
lender.occupational_info:
Co-founder and partner at Bonsai Interactive Marketing, a full service marketing agency offering the best of integrated marketing, social media, print and design and mobile marketing solutions and applications.
Founder of the 12for12k Challenge, a community-driven social media charity initiative to connect globally and help locally.
Blog featured in the AdAge Power 150 list as well as Canadas Top 50 Marketing Blogs, and won the Hive Award for Best Social Media Blog at the 2010 South by South West festival.
Worked with some of the biggest companies in tech and digital, including RIM, Microsoft Canada, IBM, British Telecom and LG Electronics.
Spoken at TEDx and regularly quoted in publications and news media, including Marketing Magazine, Canadian Marketing Association and City News Toronto.
Currently based in Burlington, Canada, offering creative solutions to marketing, digital and mobile programs.
Notable Mentions and Awards:
- Founder of the 12for12k charity initiative - Speaker at TEDx Ottawa - Featured in NetGens Commitment to Youth - Featured in the AdAge Power 150 list - Featured in Marketing in 2010 book - Featured in Staggering Social Media Insights book - Featured in Marketing Magazine - Featured on City News Toronto - Contributor to Canadian Marketing Association - Young Entrepreneur Top 10 Marketing Blogs - Canadas Top 50 Marketing Blogs - Top Marketing and Social Media Blog 2009 - Hive Award for Best Social Media Blog - PR Readers Choice Award for Most Thought-Provoking Blog - Cisions Top 100 Social Media Blogs

lender.name: Kavis
lender.loan_because:
Money in the pocket is just a piece of paper, but money in those needy hands is priceless.
It's much more valuable than it is.
All Contribution is in Memory of my beloved Mom, Yolanda Ng.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupational_info: I am studying horticulture and want to learn more about growing plants naturally without chemicals and then teaching others to also.

lender.name: Marlena
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a leg up
lender.occupational_info: I help charities raise money, so they can help people through their services and programs

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and what better way than donating to causes that I believe in!
lender.occupational_info: Currently seeking employment at a nonprofit organization.

lender.name: Sebastian Frisch
lender.loan_because: Everyone can start a successfull buisness.
lender.occupational_info: I build successfull websites.

lender.name: Yizu
lender.loan_because: I see the impact of small loans on people's lives!
lender.occupational_info: Planning and selling products services for corporations. Managing portfolio P&L. Managing analytic workstreams.

lender.name: Annemiek-Two Trees
lender.occupational_info: creator of happiness in porcelain and silver

lender.name: M. Kamlalesh
lender.loan_because: I have financial problem in my home and we are in very critical stage, still know JESUS blessed us to manage my family
lender.occupational_info: Hallow block maker

lender.name: Darius
lender.loan_because: There is so much talent out there. And economic development is in my opinion the most sustainable form of development. It doesn't make people dependent on a long term basis, but actually helps to make them add value to the community, the region and the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a consultant, I help companies find the best way to do their business and advise them on what business operations they should follow. In other words, I consult organizational entrepreneurs in the pursuit of becoming more successful.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: because it doesnt hurt to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a casino

lender.name: USA Risk Group
lender.loan_because: we wish to honor our clients and colleagues by giving back to the global economy.

lender.name: Matteo
lender.loan_because: the future is unwritten

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a great thing and provides wonderful opportunities to people less fortunate than myself

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Other people in my life have helped me at my time of need. Now it is time for me to help others
lender.occupational_info: I print books that teach people how to survive natural disasters and family loss.

lender.name: Dana & Will
lender.loan_because:
I think the vision of KIVA is perfect for providing real help for people in need around the world. My family and I are excited to be a part of it.
God bless
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own a construction company.

lender.name: kelli
lender.loan_because: It is one small thing I can do to hopefully make a difference in someone`s life.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my 2 girls, cook, clean, run errands, and everything else that needs to be done in the home. At night I go to school to learn about web site design and development (creating web sites on computers)

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: its not what you have, its what you do that counts.
lender.occupational_info: Hang in there, its a bumpy ride!

lender.name: Karolina
lender.loan_because: I care about giving people opportunities to change their lives for better

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Entertaniment Technology

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I am trying to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Student, historian, and political activist.
